fields.name: i have homework to do, sad:
Abilities:
fields.value: - Force someone to do homework at night, roleblocking them.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Investigative roles are smart and complete homework quickly, not getting roleblocked.
- Evil/Neutral roles cheat, being roleblocked for 1 night but revealling their role to you.
- All other roles do their homework normally, being roleblocked for 2 nights.
- Roleblock Immunity
- __**Part of the Daily Streak Faction**__

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Ensure the Good faction loses (this can win while dead)
